user_info.name: Balaraju Gandham
user_info.about: I’m Balaraju Gandham, a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with 1 year of experience building responsive and scalable web and mobile applications. I specialize in working with modern technologies including Angular, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, MySQL, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Ionic. I’ve contributed to the development of both enterprise-level projects and personal applications, ranging from internal tools, e-commerce platforms, to hybrid mobile apps. I follow clean code principles, RESTful API design, and agile practices, aiming to build efficient, user-centric solutions. I love exploring new technologies, solving real-world problems through code, and continuously growing as a developer. My portfolio showcases the practical work I've done across both professional and self-initiated projects.

services.title: Front-End Development
description: Build responsive and modern user interfaces using Angular, React, and Ionic.
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and seamless performance across devices.
Utilize Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap for scalable, clean UI design.

services.title: Back-End Development
description: Develop secure and scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
Implement authentication flows with JWT and role-based access.
Build efficient backend services for both web and mobile applications.

services.title: Database Management
description: Design and manage structured data using MySQL and MongoDB.
Optimize database performance and implement indexing for fast retrieval.
Ensure secure and validated data storage with backup strategies.

services.title: Full Stack Application Development
description: Build complete web and hybrid mobile applications from scratch.
Integrate frontend, backend, and database into a seamless, scalable system.
Deploy applications with a focus on performance, maintainability, and security.
